content: 3 k2tog k1 note if your stiches are twisted knit through back loop 6 round 3-12 row 1 row 2 x 5 row 1 needle t k all needle b k1 ssk k till sm sm k30 sm k across row 2 needle t k all needle b k till sm sm k1 sl1p x 15 sm k till 3 k2tog k1 7 round 13 needle t k all needle b k1 ssk sm k30 sm k across 8 round 14 remove stitch markers needle t k all needle b k2 k1 sl1p x14 k1 k2tog k1 9 round 15 needle t k all needle b k1 ssk k across 10 round 16 needle t k all needle b k1 k1 sl1p x14 k2tog k1 11 round 17 needle t k all 6 needle b k1 ssk k across leg the socks height this section is customized to your desired length i completed 35 rounds your total rounds ____________________ needles t/b k30 cuff 2x2 ribbing this section is customized to your desired length i completed 15 rounds your total rounds ____________________ needle t k2 p2 x 7 k2 needle b p2 k2 x 7 p2 finishing 1 bind off sock using jenny s surprisingly stretchy bind off or your preferred method 2 sew in yarn around cuff and toes 3 wash and block sock i hope your project turned out lovely and cannot wait to see all of your socks if you need additional guidance check out my instagram make sure to tag @vanderstiches and use the hashtag #knitsocks or #vanderstitches to share with our community happy stitches 7
